name: Moiety
description:
Moiety is an attempt to create a atmospheric game with minimal assets, and purely in black and white. It was created over a two day period for Ludum Dare 29. It was also a way to experiment with a couple of ideas I'm using in The Hit.

It's not a long game, and it's rather vague in its objectives, but it does have a win state. I hope you enjoy it.

Updated 19 August 2015 (Windows only)

This version has some extra effects, just a few things I'm prototyping for The Hit.

Dan
